title: 恭喜发财 (Gong Xi Fa Cai)
intro: My own AI-generated spin on Andy Lau's classic Gong Xi Fa Cai. A Chinese New Year gift to myself and anyone who needs it.

title: Jessy Vodka
intro: A website for my friend Jessy who loves to drink — so people can buy her a drink virtually. Completely pointless. Absolutely necessary.

title: MIA au Chocolat
intro: A 3D virtual bakery that exists only on the internet. Mine. Do not steal my croissants.

title: Santa Beer
intro: An AI-generated ad for an imaginary beer brand beloved by Santa Claus. The brief wrote itself.

title: Cassette Jury
intro: A tongue-in-cheek AI-powered app to help you and your creative partner make decisions — for when there's no time, no budget, and no patience for user testing.
